Great party game to play with friends. The more advanced RPG elements are not necessary if you're interested in a more casual experience. Cleverly designed mechanics.
This is my favorite game my n#1 Im in love with DBD light

This game has been on my radar for long weeks. 
I had concerns about buying the game mostly because the game is co op, multiplayer. the usual fear of toxic people or trolls.
I played a few hours, the game is fun and very interesting with quite a lot of features.
This may be the only game i have where i don't feel frustrated if i don't win.
-
I don't know about toxicity yet, i guess as you go through levels you can meet competitive people.
In any case, if you meet one ignore them.
All the fun is surviving and not knowing what to expect.
If being a killer in this game is difficult, try the easy characters and practice. either way you can change roles. that's okay.

The quality of the graphics and sound is very good,
The animations are realistic,
The characters are cute and fun to play.

Have fun playing this game. 
Please keep this community friendly and inviting.

[h1]Dead by Buglight[/h1]

Eigentlich w√§re es ein sch√∂nes Game. Allerdings sind die Entwickler eher darauf aus Geld mit DBD zu machen, anstatt es weiter zu verbessern, was man auch sp√ºrbar merkt. Sie f√ºgen zwar relativ h√§ufig neue Killer, Maps, Items etc. zum Spiel hinzu, jedoch merke ich seit Jahren nichts an der Performance. Mit jedem Update fixen sie [i]eventuell[/i] einen Bug und es kommen gleich 10 Neue hinzu.

Hier mal einige Bugs:
- Soundbugs
- Durch die Map glitchen
- Sich nicht heilen k√∂nnen, wenn man verletzt ist
- Als Killer in z.B. einem Stein etc. spawnen, sodass man darin gefangen ist
- Paletten, die zum Anschein noch umgeworfen werden k√∂nnen, aber schon umgeworfen wurden

Ein anderes gro√ües Problem: Der Spielspa√ü ist extrem vom Spielstil und Spielverhalten der anderen Spieler abh√§ngig. In so gut wie jeder Runde begegnet man entweder einem √úberlebenden (neben den toxischen Spielern, die disconnecten) der trollt und oder einem Killer, der entweder die ganze Zeit vorm Haken steht und wartet bis man gestorben ist (Camping) oder immer den selben Spieler jagt (Tunneling). Meistens beides.

DBD ist zwar spielbar, jedoch w√ºrde ich jedem empfehlen, das Geld in ein anderes Spiel zu investieren. Ansonsten holt es euch, wenn √ºberhaupt, wenn es im Sale ist.
Jesus Christ i hate this game but I can't stop playing it.

Damn this game's a wild ride, one minute a great game the next an awful loss, above all the DBD Is really something else, at first I didn't like the game but after a while I began to understand all the mechanics and stuff, It's now one of my favorite games. If you're looking for a fun coop game with a bit of spook and some real challenge then this is for you :3

Please never play this game, just trust me. This game is getting worse and worse in every update and especially MMR is the worst sh*t that got ever added in this game! As killer you get depression and as survivor you're just playing M1 and W simulator

Will be a great game if these things happen :
1- Remove all spamming mechanics (wiggle, hook survival) because they do not require skills, damages the keyboard/controller and are not in any way designed to bring satisfaction upon success.
2- Remove the Tombstone Build of the game since it does not bring anything positive to the game ; it only prevents survivors from actually playing the game they bought.
3- Make a game mode where survivors are given a random character with random tier 3 perks so that new and old players can enjoy a match with unfamiliar perks, increasing general flexibility of the player base. Killer players will also have the opportunity to play a match where they know all the survivors wont have burrowed time, adrenaline, decisive strike therefore allowing him to stop relying on camping strategies to score points.
Do you like new trends? Well this game is for you. This season alone, you can join in on the fun. The trend to be toxic to players for no actual reason. It's great :)
Good game with a lot of issues. Worth getting if you like games with high skill ceilings.
